whyUs.Title: Award winning support
whyUs.Paragraph: New price? New plan? No problem. We’re here to help, 24/7.

whyUs.Title: Memorable experiences
whyUs.Paragraph: Browse and book tours and activities so incredible, you’ll want to tell your friends.

whyUs.Title: Ultimate flexibility
whyUs.Paragraph: You’re in control, with free cancellation and payment options to satisfy any plan or budget.

whyUs.Title: Quality at our core
whyUs.Paragraph: High quality standards. Millions of reviews. A Tripadvisor company.

blog.Title: A Seaside Reset in Laguna Beach
blog.SubTitle: HOTEL
blog.Paragraph: From the iconic to the unexpected, the city of San Francisco never ceases to surprise. Kick-start your effortlessly delivered Northern California holiday in the cosmopolitan hills of The City . Join your Travel Director and fellow travellers for a Welcome Reception at your hotel.

blog.Title: Tiptoe through the Tulips of Washington
blog.SubTitle: STAYS
blog.Paragraph: 2021 will be a Different Skagit Valley Tulip Festival. We know there will be restrictions on the number of people who can visit our fields and gardens (and other retail establishments/restaurants/venues) based on COVID guidelines established by the state and county governments.

blog.Title: City Spotlight: Philadelphia
blog.SubTitle: STAYS
blog.Paragraph: This article is part of Earth Refuge’s Spotlight Series on Philadelphia. During the summer of 2021, cities across the United States (‘US’) have seen record breaking temperatures to an extent that scientists say would have been “virtually impossible” to reach without anthropogenic climate change.

blog.Title: The Castle on the Cliff: Majestic, Magic, Manoir
blog.SubTitle: BOOKING
blog.Paragraph: Thousands of migrants – of whom, many are children – suffer from deadly heat conditions at the US-Mexico border. As the effects of climate change worsen day by day, extreme weather conditions are causing a high risk of dehydration and death amongst migrants who try to enter the States.
